1. Installing MUSEpack¶

To install MUSEpack download the latest repository from https://github.com/pzeidler89/MUSEpack MUSEpack is a Python3 only package and will not be supported for any version less than 3.6.

1.1. Additional python packages¶

To fully run all modules the following non-standard modules need to be installed:

  • pyspeckit
  • ppxf
  • pysynphot

1.2. Additional 3rd party software¶

To properly run MUSEreduce.musereduce the latest version of the ESO’s MUSE data reduction pipeline has to be installed. The latest version including the manual and further instructions can be found under: https://www.eso.org/sci/software/pipelines/muse/.
